name: HH_EPSD_DP_NOTES
description: This table contains user-entered Home Health episode demographic and patient history notes information. This information is entered in the Referral Info 2 form as part of an Intake encounter.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEM_AND_PAT_NOTES
columns.description: Text entered by a user in demographic and patient history notes for the episode.
